long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
🏃 Vex 3 is an exciting platformer where you take on a series of action-packed levels filled with challenging obstacles and puzzles. Test your reflexes and problem-solving skills as you guide your stickman through dangerous traps and tricky environments. Each level brings new surprises and obstacles to overcome.

Why play Vex 3?
Thrilling Gameplay: Experience fast-paced platforming action with precise controls and exciting jumps.
Challenging Levels: Navigate complex stages filled with spikes, saws, and other obstacles.
Variety of Levels: Explore multiple stages with hidden challenges to keep things fresh.
No Downloads Needed: Jump right into the game from your browser—no installation required.
Race Against Time: Improve your performance and challenge your friends to beat your best times.
Make sure to explore the menu for level selection, and don’t forget to check out the rate, website, and share buttons for an enhanced experience. Ready for the challenge? Let’s go! 🏃
